thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-CommScope Reports Q4 Adjusted Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.47

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CommScope Reports Q4 Adjusted Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.47
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - CommScope Holding Company Inc:
* COMMSCOPE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.47
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.27 * Q4 SALES $1.12 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.56 TO $2.71
* SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.44 TO $0.49
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.46 TO $1.58 * SEES Q1 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13 TO $0.16 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $4.675 BILLION TO $4.825 BILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $1.085 BILLION TO $1.135 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.47, REVENUE VIEW $1.11 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.52, REVENUE VIEW $1.12 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.59, REVENUE VIEW $4.77 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
